mapper.update: update budget_fpplication_form set prj_id=#{budge.prjId}, task_list_id=#{budge.taskListId}, prj_unit=#{budge.prjUnit}, budget_date=#{budge.budgetDate}, declarer=#{budge.declarer}, make_time=#{budge.makeTime}, state=#{budge.state} where bf_id=#{budge.bfId}
mapper.select: select b.*,t.prj_name,t.prj_owner_unit from budget_fpplication_form b left join task t on b.prj_id=t.prj_id left join mode_status m on b.bf_id=m.mode_id where m.status=#{status} and b.state=#{state}
